availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James L. Clark (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Clark. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Hopkins County, KY, July 1863, p. 5, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "James Lafayette Clark (May 8, 1832-March 25, 1864)," Memorial #155657715, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/155657715 (accessed May 8, 2018).
